name: Leap
body:
### Leap
## The Free Linux Distro
Leap is a free Linux distro that focuses on simplicity and the **ability** to do more
## #It has
# --The Budgie Desktop Environment(Dependant on the variant of Leap you get)
# --Wine so you can run all of your favourite apps.
# --The Raven Sidebar to do things more fluently
# --Blender for the occasional animation attempts
# --Inkscape for all your drawing needs
# --LXTerminal and PCManFM File Manager preinstalled
# --The simplicity of the Budgie Menu
# --Different desktop environments available
# --The complete LibreOffice Collection
# --Docky Preinstalled
# --Testdrive Available

Downloads:
# [All Downloads](https://susestudio.com/a/QjxvPz)
# [Leap Home](https://susestudio.com/a/QjxvPz/leap-home) [Test Drive](https://susestudio.com/a/QjxvPz/leap-home/start_testdrive?version=2017.0.3)
# [Leap XFCE Edition](https://susestudio.com/a/QjxvPz/leap-xfce-edition) [Test Drive](https://susestudio.com/a/QjxvPz/leap-xfce-edition/start_testdrive?version=2017.0.0)
# [Leap Cinnamon](https://susestudio.com/a/QjxvPz/leap-cinnamon) [Test Drive](https://susestudio.com/a/QjxvPz/leap-cinnamon/start_testdrive?version=2017.0.0)
# [Leap Enterprise](https://susestudio.com/a/QjxvPz/leap-enterprise) [Test Drive](https://susestudio.com/a/QjxvPz/leap-enterprise/start_testdrive?version=2017.0.0)
# [Leap Core](https://susestudio.com/a/QjxvPz/leap-core)
